channel.title: Mining tin

item.title: Mining tin
item.dc:creator: @w-e_s-l_e-y w-e_s-l_e-y@hotmail.com
item.description:
@w-e_s-l_e-y wrote:

If I mine tin, I get something what looks like coins and it in Null.
I haven’t changed anything in my mining codes…

case 2094: case 2095: // tin rock pEmote = 0x554; mining[0] = 1; mining[1] = 1; if (misc.random(2) == 1) { mining[2] = 700; } else { mining[2] = 710; } mining[4] = 1000; break;

Read full topic
